name: goddammit
content:
an expression of anger: I don't know, goddammit! Goddammit, what do you think you're doing?
used for emphasis: Goddamnit I was bored. Synonym
dammitSee also
damn
More examplesFewer examples"Goddammit!" she yelled.If I could, goddammit, I'd kick you out in the street."What do you want me to say?" "I don't know, goddammit, but you have to say something."I'm doing my best, goddammit.You always take his side, goddammit!
